name: Campfire chaos
description:
You appear in a limited world where you have to throw everything you see into the fire (well, almost everything).

Ui:
At the bottom of the screen it is written that you need to burn in the fire and your statistics. At the top of the screen, you see your score.
Pedestals(trash can):
They will spawn items and enemies. Use the right mouse button (RMB) to see what are they doing.
Enemy:
They look like you, but they are evil (and dumb). When they get to you they die, damaging you. And if they get to items, they just eat them. Try to burn them!
Picklevel:
This is your strength, the greater the strength, the more heavy objects you can lift. It increases every 3 recipes.

Control:
WASD - move
E - pick/drop item
I - show game help
RMB - show item info
Alt+F4 - quit
